subject: Travel
title: Port Royal: The Wickedest City
description: A short lesson to help you apply Port Royal: The Wickedest City.

hook.text: Port Royal, Jamaica, was called the wickedest city on Earth. In 1692, an earthquake sank half of it into the sea.

buildup.text: Pirates, rum, gambling, and stolen treasure made it the richest port in the Caribbean.

discovery.text: A massive earthquake liquefied the sand beneath the city. Buildings, streets, and people slid into the harbor.

twist.text: Preachers declared it God's punishment for sin. Survivors built a new town and kept up the pirate business.

climax.text: Underwater archaeologists have found intact buildings, bottles, and even a stopped pocket watch frozen at 11:43 AM.

punchline.text: A pocket watch on the ocean floor still shows the exact moment the city sank.

quiz.question: What caused Port Royal to sink?
options: An earthquake that liquefied the sand
